description_data.value: ** RESERVED ** This candidate has been reserved by an organization or individual that will use it when announcing a new security problem. When the candidate has been publicized, the details for this candidate will be provided.

descriptions.value: In sendHciCommand of bluetooth_hci.cc, there is a possible out of bounds read due to a heap buffer overflow. This could lead to local information disclosure with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.

En sendHciCommand de bluetooth_hci.cc, existe una posible lectura fuera de los límites debido a un desbordamiento de búfer de almacenamiento dinámico. Esto podría conducir a la divulgación de información local con privilegios de ejecución de System necesarios. La interacción del usuario no es necesaria para la explotación.
